title: Accessible Design System
shortDescription: Production-ready design system emphasizing accessibility, theming, and developer workflows with comprehensive WCAG compliance
challenge: Creating a comprehensive design system that maintains WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all components while providing flexible theming capabilities and seamless developer experience for large-scale applications.
solution: Built a modular design system using React and TypeScript with Storybook for component documentation. Implemented automated accessibility testing with eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y, established design token workflows, and created comprehensive guidelines for developers to maintain accessibility standards.
